```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, fig.align = "center", 
                      message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(patchwork)
library(ggfortify)
library(matrixcalc)
library(zeallot)
# Load files
source(file = "R/matrices.R")
source(file = "R/simulate.R")
```

```{r, echo = F}
# global parameters
bool_plot <- T
bool_loud <- F
```

```{r, echo = F}
# Set seed
set.seed(23)
# Set parameters
M <- 3
mu <- 0
sd <- 1
# Generate matrix
P <- RM_stoch(M, symm = T, sparsity = F)
```

## Step 1: Get the batch 

```{r}
# Set batch parameters
B <- 4
# Create batch
batch <- make_batch(M = M, B = B)
```

## Step 2: Evolve the batch

```{r}
# Set evolution parameters
steps <- 20
# Evolve batch
evolved_batch <- evolve_batch(batch, steps)
```

### Step 3: Analyze the batch

```{r}
# Add indexing to the batch
evolved_batch <- indexed_batch(evolved_batch, steps)
```

```{r}
# Plot the evolution arrays of the batch elements
batch_data <- evolved_batch
ggplot(batch_data, mapping = aes(x = x1, y = x2, color = x3, shape = as.factor(index_column))) + geom_point()
```
